title: Power-saving tips
answer:
1. When using a mobile phone, press the power button to turn off the screen. 

 2. Screen brightness: Click Brightness in the drop-down menu to set the darker screen brightness. 

 3. Bluetooth and Wi-Fi: Power off the Bluetooth or Wi-Fi in the drop-down menu. 

 4. Mobile data: Disconnect the Mobile data in the drop-down menu if you donâ€™t need it. 

 5. GPS: Power off the GPS in the drop-down menu.
